text: Georg Gerle (1520–1591) was a Renaissance luthier specialising in lutes, from Füssen, Germany. He worked in Northern Italy and in Austria. His instruments survive at the Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna, Austria. ==References== Category:Lute makers Category:Luthiers Category:1520 births Category:1591 deaths Category:People from Füssen
title: Georg Gerle
